column2: "Ɔnam dɛ dodowara dze ato hɔn do dɛ wɔbɛkyerɛw ndzɛmba a aba mu wɔ hɛn mu no esiado esiado
column4: "dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a ahyɛse no wɔdze hɔn enyiwa hunii na wɔyɛɛ asɛm no ho asomfo no dze abrɛ hɛn no ntsi;"

column2: "Onyimnyamfo Kɛse Teofilus
column3: mohwɛ a oye ma mo so dɛ mahwehwɛ ne nyina mu pɛpɛɛpɛ fitsi ahyɛse yi
column4: mekyerɛw no esiado esiado brɛ wo
column6: "ama eehu nsɛm a wɔakyerɛkyerɛ wo no no mu nokwar."

column2: "Judea ɔhen Herod n'aber do no
column3: nna ɔsɔfo bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Zekaria a ofi Abija no kuw mu; na ne yer nye Aaron ne mbabaa no mu bi a wɔfrɛ no Elizabet."

column2: "Nna hɔn beenu nyina yɛ atseneneefo wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim
column3: na wodzii Ewuradze ne mbransɛm ɔnye n'ahyɛdze no nyina do
column8: na afei hɔn beenu nyina so enyinyin papaapa."

column2: "Da bi nna esi n'asɔfokuw do dɛ wɔyɛ edwuma wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim
column4: "na dɛ mbrɛ asɔfo dwuma no ne nhyehyɛɛ tse no
column5: wɔtwee tonto yii no dɛ ɔnkɔ Ewuradze asɔrdan no mu nkɛhyew eduhuam."

column2: "Na ber a ɔrehyew eduhuam no
column3: nna ɔman no nyimpadodow nyina gyina abowano rosɔr."

column2: "Na Ewuradze no bɔfoe begyinaa eduhuam afɔrmbukyia no nyimfa yii noho kyerɛɛ no."
"Na Zekaria hun no no
column3: n'akoma tui

column2: "Na bɔfo no see no dɛ
column3: Mma nnsuro
column6: na wo yer Elizabet bɔwo babanyin ama wo

column2: "Na ibenya dɛw nye enyigye
column3: na nyimpa dodowara bedzi n'awoo ho dɛw."

column2: "Na ɔbɛyɛ kɛse wɔ Ewuradze enyim
column3: na ɔnnkɔnom wenyin anaaso nsa biara
column4: na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn bɛhyɛ no ma fi ne na ne yamu mpo."

column2: "Na ɔbɛdan Israelmba dodowara aba Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn hɔ."
"Na ɔnam Elija no sunsum nye no tum mu bedzi n'enyim akɛdan egyanom hɔn akoma aba hɔn mba ho
column3: nye asoɔdzenfo aba tseneneefo hɔn nyimdzee mu
column4: na oesiesie ɔman a wɔaboaboa hɔnho ama Ewuradze."

column2: "Na Zekaria see bɔfo no dɛ
column3: Mubodua dɛn mehu yi? Osiandɛ meyɛ akɔdaa na me yer so edzi mfe pii."

column2: "Na bɔfo no buae see no dɛ
column3: Emi nye Gabriel a migyina Nyankopɔn enyim
column4: na wɔasoma me dɛ membɛkasa nkyerɛ wo

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: ebɔtɔ mmum
column4: na irunntum nnkasa dze akɛpem da a yinom bɛyɛ hɔ
column5: osiandɛ anngye me nsɛm a ɔbɛba mu wɔ n'aber do no enndzi."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ nkorɔfo a wɔrotweɔn Zekaria no nwanwa dɛ ɔakyɛr dɛm wɔ asɔrdan no mu."
"Na opuei no
column3: oenntum annkasa annkyerɛ hɔn; na wohun dɛ oekenya enyido adzehu bi wɔ asɔrdan mu hɔ; na ɔnodze
column4: ɔkɔr do araa dze ne nsa yɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze osiandɛ nna ɔda ho araa tɔ mmum."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ no som nda wiee du no
column3: osii mu kɔr nankasa ne fie."

column2: "Na nda no ekyir no ne yer Elizabet nyinsenii na osumaa noho abosoom enum see dɛ
column5: wɔ nda a ɔabɔhwɛ me dɛ obeyi m'enyimguase wɔ nyimpa mu no

column2: "Na bosoom a otsia esia no mu no
column3: Nyankopɔn somaa ɔbɔfo Gabriel wɔ Galilii kurow bi a wɔfrɛ no Nazarɛt
column5: "wɔ ɔbaabun bi a wɔdze no ama ɔbanyin bi a wɔfrɛ no Josef a ofi David ebusua mu no awar no hɔ; na ɔbaabun no ne dzin dze Mary."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no hɔ bɛsee no dɛ
column3: Ei
column6: "#1.28 Tsetse akyerɛwfo binom dze “Ɔwo a woehyira wo mbasiafo mu” no ka ho."

column2: "Na n'akoma tui wɔ kasa no ho
column3: na ɔdwendween ne tsir mu dɛ ebɛn nkyia na iyi bɛyɛ."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo no see no dɛ
column3: Mary

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: ibenyinsen
column4: na awo babanyin na ato no dzin JESUS."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ kɛse
column3: na wɔbɛfrɛ no nyia ɔwɔ sorsor no ne Ba; na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn dze n'egya David ahengua no bɛma no

column2: "na obedzi Jakob fi do hen daapem
column3: na n'ahendzi nnkɔbɔ adze da."

column2: "Na Mary see ɔbɔfo no dɛ
column3: Minnyim banyin yi

column2: "Na bɔfo no buae see no dɛ
column3: Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn bɛba wo do
column4: na nyia ɔwɔ sorsor no n'ahoɔdzen bɛkata wo do; dɛm ntsi so adze krɔnkrɔn a wɔbɔwo no no

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: wo busuanyi Elizabet so enyinsen babanyin wɔ ne mberwaber mu
column4: na nyia wɔfrɛ no ɔbɔnyin no

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn afamu dze
column3: biribiara nnyi hɔ a onntum nnyɛ hɔ."

column2: "Na Mary see dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: Ewuradze afonabaa nye me: ɔnyɛ hɔ mma me dɛ mbrɛ w'asɛm se. Na bɔfo no fii ne nkyɛn kɔree."

column2: "Na nda no mu ara Mary soɛɛr ntsɛntsɛm kɔr Juda nkokodo nkurow no bi mu;"
"na ɔkɛhɛɛn Zekaria fie kekyiaa Elizabet."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ Elizabet tsee Mary ne nkyia no
column3: ɔba no huruuw ne yamu; na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn hyɛɛ Elizabet ma
column5: "na ɔdze ndze kɛse kasae see dɛ
column6: Nhyira aka wo wɔ mbasiafo mu
column7: na nhyira aka wo yamu aba."

column2: "Na iyi fi hen ba mo hɔ
column3: dɛ m'Ewuradze ne na bɛba me nkyɛn?"

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: ntsɛmara a wo nkyia twaa m'asomu no
column4: na abofra no dze dɛw huruhuruwii wɔ mo mu."

column2: "Na nhyira aka nyia ɔagye edzi: na dza Ewuradze ama wɔabɛka akyerɛ no no bɛba mu."
"Na Mary see dɛ: Me kra tonton Ewuradze
"Na mo sunsum dzi dɛw wɔ me Nyankopɔn m'Agyenkwa no mu."
"Osiandɛ ɔabɔhwɛ n'afonabaa wɔ ne mbrɛadze asetsena mu: Na hwɛ
column3: ofitsi ndɛ ebusuasantsen nyina bɛfrɛ me osiarfo."

column2: "Osiandɛ Otumfo ayɛ adze kɛse ama me; na Ne dzin nye krɔnkrɔn."
"Na n'ehumbɔbɔr wɔ hɔn a wosuro no do fi ebusuasantsen do kɛpem ebusuasantsen."
"Ɔdze ne basa akyerɛ ahoɔdzen
column3: Ɔapansam nkontompɔfo wɔ hɔn akoma adwen mu."

column2: "Oetu etumfo efi hɔn nhengua do
column3: Na ɔama hɔn a wɔbrɛ adze no do."

column2: "Ɔdze ndzepa amee hɔn a ɔkɔm dze hɔn
column3: na oegya ahonyafo kwan wɔ yafumpan mu."

column2: "Oesuo n'akowaa Israel mu dɛ ɔdze bɛkaa n'ehumbɔbɔr
column4: "dɛ mbrɛ ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom no

column2: "Na Mary nye Elizabet tsenaa bɛyɛ abosoom ebiasa
column3: na ɔsanee kɔr noara ne fie."

column2: "Na Elizabet n'aber a ɔdze bɔwo durii
column3: na ɔwoo babanyin."

column2: "Na no sɔnmufo nye n'ebusuafo tsee ehumbɔbɔr kɛse a Ewuradze dze ehu no
column3: na wɔnye no dzii dɛw."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ne ndaawɔtwe soe no
column3: wɔbaa dɛ worubotwa abofra no twatsia
column4: na wɔpɛɛ dɛ nkyɛ wɔbɛfrɛ no Zekaria
column5: dɛ mbrɛ n'egya ne dzin tse

column2: "naaso ne na buae see dɛ
column3: Oho

column2: "Na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Obiara nnyi w'ebusua mu a ne dzin dze dɛm."

column2: "Na wɔdze nsa bisaa n'egya dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛ dɛ wɔfrɛ no."
"Na obisaa kyerɛwpon kyerɛɛw do dɛ
column3: Ne dzin nye John. Na ɔyɛɛ hɔn nyina nwanwa."

column2: "Na n'ano nye ne tɛkyerɛma buee amonmu hɔ ara
column3: na ɔkasae yii Nyankopɔn ayɛw."

column2: "Na hu kaa hɔn a wɔtsetse hɔn nkyɛn nyina
column3: na nsɛm yi nyina wɔkekae wɔ Judea nkokodo nkurow nyina mu."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtsee nyina dze too hɔn akoma mu dɛ
column3: Abofra bɛn na oyi bɛyɛ? Osiandɛ Ewuradze ne nsa wɔ no do."

column2: "Na n'egya Zekaria dze
column3: Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn bɛhyɛɛ no ma na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm dɛ
column6: Israel Nyankopɔn; Osiandɛ ɔabɔhwɛ no nkorɔfo na ɔapon hɔn
column8: "Na ɔama nkwagye ambɛn do ama hɛn Wɔ n'akowaa David fie
column10: "dɛ mbrɛ ɔnam no nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ fi tsetse no hɔn ano do kae no
column12: "dɛ wɔngye hɛn mfi hɛn atamfo nye hɔn a wokyir hɛn nyina nsamu;"

column2: "Dɛ ɔbɛyɛ ehumbɔbɔr ama hɛn egyanom
column3: na ɔakaa n'ahyɛmu krɔnkrɔn no;"

column2: "ntam a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɛn egya Abraham
column4: "dɛ ɔbɛma woeyi hɛn efi hɛn atamfo nsamu
column5: na yɛasom no dɛ hu nnyi mu
column7: "wɔ ahotsewee nye tsenenee mu wɔ n'enyim hɛn nkwa nda nyina."

column2: "Na ɔwo abofra yi
column3: wɔbɛfrɛ wo nyia ɔwɔ sorsor no nkɔnhyɛnyi: Osiandɛ ibedzi Ewuradze n'enyim kan ekesiesie n'akwan mu

column2: "dze nkwagye ho nyimdzee akɛma no nkorɔfo wɔ hɔn bɔnfakyɛ mu a"
"ofi hɛn Nyankopɔn n'ayamuhyehye mbɔbɔrhu no mu
column3: a ɔnam do ma adzekyee a ofi sor abɔhwɛ hɛn no
column5: "dɛ ɔbɛhyerɛn ama hɔn a wɔtsetse sum mu nye owu no sunsuma ase; na wɔatsentsen hɛn anan akɔ asomdwee kwan no do."

column2: "Na abofra no nyinii
column3: na ɔyɛɛ dzen wɔ sunsum mu; na ɔtsenaa sar no do kodur da a ɔdze noho kɛkyerɛɛ Israel."
